value.name: ‘We must press on.’ State College community marks anniversary of George Floyd’s death
value.description: One year after George Floyd was killed in Minneapolis, State College community members gathered Tuesday to reflect on Floyd’s life and the lives of other Black Americans lost to police brutality in the last 365 days.

value.description: As the state prepares to roll out an updated unemployment system, GOP lawmakers are pushing to strip away benefits and add work-search requirements.
